bibl.title: Dispatch from L de R. du Verge to J.C. Bancroft Davis
Despatches from United States consuls in St. Paul de Loanda, 1854-1893

revisionDesc.change: Creation of individual xml files, review, and addition encoding

div1.note: No 11 Aug 2 flag & arms ordered Oct 20/82 Received Oct 7 1882
div1.p: United States Consulate at St Paul de Loanda
L de R. du Verge to Dept, of State
Encloses Request and purpose for the same
United States Consulate St. Paul de Loanda Augt. 12th 1882
To Honorable J.C. Bancroft Davis Asst. Secty of State Washington D.C.

Sir I have the honor most respectfully to request that blank forms and stationary send be forwarded to this consulate as soon as possible besides Eight U.S. Flags; Two one for consulate only for this consulate which is in need of the same, and six other for the Consular send agents on this coast, together with six consular regulations; for which this send consulate will be responsible.
I would also respectfulyt ask that another U.S. Coat of arms be forwarded send to me, as the old one is noe unfit for use
I have the honr to be Sir Respectfully Your obedient servant L de R. du Verge U.S. Consul
